Dialogue.Value: Hey，the gang’s all here.
Of course!,It’s a class emergency!
And I couldn’t do a thing,during the University incident.
We’ll make quick work of this,if we tackle it as a team!
Time to show ya my cool side!
I like what I’m hearing，,you guys.
Alright! Let’s do it!
Mm? Where are you going?
Where....?,It’s this way，yeah?
Why’re you pointing over,there?,The path is over here.
I think I see a way to get,over there，but....
Could you guys get your,stories straight?,You can’t all be right.
What’s going on?
I got it!,Our access rights are all,messed up!
Access rights?
Each student at this school,is assigned access rights.
For example，class committee,members can access special,networks.
That ROM guy must’ve,messed ’em up! For sure!
Well，we can’t get where we,need to go if we’re missing,access rights.
We should be able to change,our access rights on the,terminals in this area.
Let’s all split up and fix our,access rights!
Right!,Go find every terminal you can!
Very well!
ROM’S ATTACK HAS,CORRUPTED STUDENTS’,ACCESS RIGHTS!
TO CHANGE YOUR ACCESS,RIGHTS，PLEASE USE THE,TERMINAL!
HOWEVER，YOU CAN ONLY,CHANGE ONE RIGHT PER,TERMINAL!
YOU CAN’T REACH THE,BACK OF THE AREA UNLESS,YOU USE EACH TERMINAL!
ROM’S ACCESS RIGHTS,ARE FIXED NOW，BUT,YOU STILL HAVE ALL OF
YOURS FROM WHEN THE,INCIDENT OCCURRED!
IS THAT REALLY OKAY?
YOU HAVE TO GO TO THE,BACK OF THE AREA TO,STOP THE ELECTRICITY!
THE ELECTRICITY IS,A DEFENSE AGAINST,SUSPICIOUS PERSONS!
SUSPICIOUS PERSONS,WITH KNIVES ARE SCARY，,AFTER ALL!
THE BREAKER FOR THE,CLASSROOM IS JUST UP,AHEAD!
HURRY! HURRY!
LEARN WELL!,EAT WELL!,SLEEP WELL!
This is as far as I can go.
Do you see a path，,Shanghai?
Kh....,These viruses are quite,formidable....!
It’s a dead end!
This must be the limit of my,access rights.,Pathetic....
The door is closed.,I can’t go through....
Maybe the terminals we’ve,found so far didn’t give us,enough access rights....?
Leave it to me!
Alright!,Looks like I was the only one,who could get over here.
Go ahead，Shanghai!
Thanks，Rika!,You too，TankMan!
Mmm.... Looks like this is,as far as my access rights,can take me.
Shanghai changed her,access rights.
The range of Shanghai’s,permissions has expanded!
There are no more access,rights to change on this,terminal.
There are no more access,rights to change on this,terminal.
Shanghai changed her,access rights.
The range of Shanghai’s,permissions has expanded!
There are no more access,rights to change on this,terminal.
There are no more access,rights to change on this,terminal.
Shanghai changed her,access rights.
The range of Shanghai’s,permissions has expanded!
There are no more access,rights to change on this,terminal.
There are no more access,rights to change on this,terminal.
Shanghai changed her,access rights.
The range of Shanghai’s,permissions has expanded!
There are no more access,rights to change on this,terminal.
There are no more access,rights to change on this,terminal.
This is the classroom’s,electricity control program!
There!,That should stop the current!
Jack out so we can evacuate!
There are no more access,rights to change on this,terminal.
